narration.text: Most developers are still stuck with GitHub Copilot in 2025…
but in 2026, everyone is switching to one free AI tool that writes entire features like a pro.
It’s helpful… but it doesn’t really understand your whole project.
Meet Cursor – an AI-first code editor built on VS Code.
Watch this: I tell it 'Add user authentication to this Next.js app'…
and boom – it creates the auth files, updates routes, adds environment variables, and even writes the login component – all in seconds.
Cursor has full project context, multi-file edits, built-in agents that run tasks autonomously, and an unlimited free tier.
Devs are calling it faster and smarter than Copilot – and it’s completely free to start.
If you want to code 2–3 times faster in 2026 – for interviews, placements, or real projects – you need to try Cursor today.
Link in description. Drop a LIKE if you’re switching, comment your current AI tool below, and SUBSCRIBE for more must-know tech in 2026!
